data.name: cmdAcceptInvitation.Text

data.value: Postpone Decision

data.value: Decline Invitation

data.value: Effective On

data.name: ExpiresOn.Text
data.value: Expires On

data.name: InvalidInvitationLink.Text
data.value: The invitation link you have clicked is invalid. Please contact the site administrator for assistance.

data.name: InvitationAcceptedSuccess.Text
data.value: Your invitation has been successfully accepted and you are now a registered site user.

data.name: InvitationAlreadyAccepted.Text
data.value: You already accepted this invitation on {0}. Please log into the site using your assigned username and password.

data.name: InvitationAlreadyDeclined.Text
data.value: You already declined this invitation on {0}. Should you wish to join the website, please contact the inviting user or site administrator to request a new invitation.

data.name: InvitationDeclined.Text
data.value: We are sorry that you decided to decline the invitation but will respect your wishes by not contacting you again. Should you desire to join this website at a later date, please contact the site administrator to request a new invitation.

data.name: InvitationExpiredorRetracted.Text
data.value: Your invitation has either expired or was retracted by the inviting user. Please contact the inviting user or site administrator to request a new invitation.

data.name: plDisplayName.Help
data.value: Enter how you would like to be identified in the public areas of this site

data.name: plDisplayName.Text
data.value: Display Name

data.value: Enter your first name

data.value: First Name

data.name: valFirstName.Required
data.value: You must enter your first name.

data.name: valLastName.Required
data.value: You must enter your last name.

data.name: valPassword.RegexInvalid
data.value: The password is either too short or not sufficiently complex

data.name: valPassword.Required
data.value: You must enter your password

data.name: valPassword2.CompareInvalid
data.value: The confirmation password does not match the password typed above.

data.name: valPassword2.Required
data.value: You must re-enter your password as confirmation

data.name: valUsername.RegexInvalid
data.value: The username does not satisfy the character pattern for usernames.

data.name: valUsername.Required
data.value: You must enter your username.

data.name: plTemporaryPassword.Help
data.value: Enter the temporary password that you were assigned in your invitation email.

data.name: plTemporaryPassword.Text
data.value: Temporary Password

data.name: valTemporaryPassword.Required
data.value: You must enter the temporary password that was assigned in your invitation email.

data.name: plAnswer.Help
data.value: Enter an answer to the Password Retrieval Question

data.name: plAnswer.Text
data.value: Password Retrieval Answer

data.name: plQuestion.Help
data.value: Enter a verification question that will be displayed when retrieving a forgotten password.

data.name: plQuestion.Text
data.value: Password Retrieval Question

data.name: valAnswer.Required
data.value: You must enter an answer to the Password Retrieval Question

data.name: valQuestion.Required
data.value: You must enter a Password Retrieval Question

data.name: plReasonDeclined.Help
data.value: You may optionally state the reason that you have declined the invitation. Note that this information may be shared with site user who invited you to join.

data.name: plReasonDeclined.Text
data.value: Reason Declined

data.name: AdminVisibleOnly.Text
data.value: The By Invitation processing module is visible only to administrators when querystring parameters are invalid or missing as would be the case when directly viewing this page.

data.name: InvitationProcessingPostponed.Text
data.value: Your invitation to join this site will remain valid until its expiration date of {0}. Should you decide to accept or decline the invitation prior to its expiration, you may click the 'Join' or 'Decline' link in the original invitation email to re-visit this page.

data.name: plPersistLogin.Help
data.value: Check the box if you want to be logged in automatically without entering your Username and Password the next time you visit this site. Note: Do not check if accessing site on a public computer used by others!

data.name: plPersistLogin.Text
data.value: Remember Login Next Time

data.name: ValidProfileRequired.Text
data.value: This website requires that each registered user complete all required fields of a user profile when either registering or logging in for the first time. You are being redirected to your personal profile form . . .

data.name: NewPassword.Help
data.value: If as red * appears beside this field's title, you may not continue using your temporary password and MUST enter a new password here.

data.name: NewPassword.Text
data.value: New Password

data.name: AcceptConfirmation.Text
data.value:
Welcome [Invitation:RecipientFullName]{if ([Invitation:AssignedUsername] !="")} ([Invitation:AssignedUsername]){endif}!

Please review your registration information below, make any necessary changes, then click on 'Accept Invitation and Join Website' button below.

data.name: DeclineConfirmation.Text
data.value:
Hello [Invitation:RecipientFullName]:

To confirm that you wish to decline your invitation, click on the 'Decline Invitation' button below. You may also postpone your decision to Accept or Decline by clicking on the 'Postpone Decision' button below.

data.name: valDisplayName.RegexInvalid
data.value: The display name does not conform to the allowed character pattern or contains prohibited terms.

data.name: ProcessingSuspended.Text
data.value: Invitation processing has been temporarily suspended. Please try again later to accept or decline your invitation.

data.name: InvalidTemporaryPassword-Lockout.Text
data.value: After multiple failures to correctly enter the temporary password which was included in your emailed invitation, further attempts to accept this invitation will be blocked for a period of time. Please try again later after reconfirming the correct temporary password or contacting a site administrator.

data.name: InvalidTemporaryPassword.Text
data.value: Please enter the correct temporary password as indicated in your emailed invitation.

data.name: InvitationLockedOut.Text
data.value: You are temporarily locked out from further attempts to accept this invitation because the temporary password was incorrectly entered multiple times. Please try again later after confirming the correct passward from the emailed invitation or contact a site administrator for assistance.

data.name: cmdUpdateProfile.Text
data.value: Update Profile

data.name: ProfileUpdated.Text
data.value: Your user profile has been successfully updated.

data.value: Your email address is your username.
